channel.description: Recent content on Mark's Prayer Site

item.title: Today's Prayer
item.description: January 8, 2026 Today's Verse 1 Timothy 1:17 [17] To the King of the ages, immortal, invisible, the only God, be honor and glory forever and ever. Amen. Today's Memory Verse Isaiah 40:28 - Have you not known? Have you not heard? The Lord is the everlasting God, the Creator of the ends of the earth. He does not faint or grow weary; his understanding is unsearchable. Today's Westminster Catechism Q/A 8 - How doth God execute his decrees?
